metadata.title: Thursday, 29th October, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    how many teachers’ houses are earmarked for construction in Chasefu Parliamentary Constituency in 2015 and 2016;
(b)    what the estimated cost of the exercise is; and
(c)    which schools will benefit from the exercise.

questions.minister: Minister of Works and Supply when the Mnyamanzi Bridge in Vulamkoko Ward in Mkaika Parliamentary Constituency will be constructed.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutiona and Statutory Expenditure):  Committee of Supply. Heads 01/01, 02/01, 02/03, 02/04, 38/01, 38/02, 38/03, 38/04 and 38/05 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 01    -    Office of the President - State House Head 02    -    Office of the Vice President Head 38    -    Ministry of Development Planning
